mapper.sql: id, name, pid, record_time, remark, status, temp, case1, case2, case3, case4, case5
mapper.select:
select
distinct
,
from record
order by ${orderByClause}

select
distinct
from record
order by ${orderByClause}

select * from record
`name` like concat('%',#{name},'%')
AND pid = #{pid,jdbcType=BIGINT}
AND record_time = #{recordTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
create_time >= #{startTime} AND create_time < #{endTime}
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=CHAR},
temp = #{temp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
case1 = #{case1,jdbcType=CHAR},
case2 = #{case2,jdbcType=CHAR},
case3 = #{case3,jdbcType=CHAR},
case4 = #{case4,jdbcType=CHAR},
case5 = #{case5,jdbcType=CHAR},
mapper.insert: insert into record (id, name, pid, record_time, remark, status, temp, case1, case2, case3, case4, case5, info) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{recordTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{temp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{case1,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{case2,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{case3,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{case4,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{case5,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{info,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
